java/liquibase/change/DropIndexChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropIndexStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Index;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00020 public class DropIndexChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String indexName;
00024     private String tableName;
00025 
00026     public DropIndexChange() {
00027         super("dropIndex", "Drop Index");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getIndexName() {
00039         return indexName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setIndexName(String indexName) {
00043         this.indexName = indexName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getTableName() {
00047         return tableName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00051         this.tableName = tableName;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00055         return new SqlStatement[] {
00056             new DropIndexStatement(getIndexName(), getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName())
00057         };
00058     }
00059 
00060     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00061         return "Index " + getIndexName() + " dropped from table " + getTableName();
00062     }
00063 
00064     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00065         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropIndex");
00066         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00067             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00068         }
00069 
00070         element.setAttribute("indexName", getIndexName());
00071         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00072 
00073         return element;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00077         Index index = new Index();
00078         index.setTable(new Table(tableName));
00079         index.setName(indexName);
00080 
00081         Table table= new Table(getTableName());
00082 
00083         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(index, table));
00084     }
00085     
00086 }
